name: Missile showdown (TheLeoDeveloper)
description:
Game made in 1 day in pygame

How to play

- you need to destroy the red base 

- you can shoot missile by pressing Q while hovering over your base with the mouse cursor

- you can guide your missile with the mouse cursor

- one missile does 10 HP of damage

- you can destroy enemy missiles by crashing your missile into enemy missile

- when the round ends you can press E to retry

- This game is open source:

  Source code
